mapper.update: UPDATE `site` SET pv_model = #{pv_model}, pv_module_temperature_coeff = #{pv_module_temperature_coeff}, stc_temperature = #{stc_temperature}, inverter_efficiency = #{inverter_efficiency}, t_avg = #{t_avg}, system_loss = #{system_loss}, clip = #{clip}, bifaciality_factor = #{bifaciality_factor}, ids_device_poa = #{ids_device_poa}, ids_device_rpoa = #{ids_device_rpoa}, ids_device_panel_temp = #{ids_device_panel_temp}, ids_device_ambient_temp = #{ids_device_ambient_temp}, modules_per_string = #{modules_per_string}, number_of_strings = #{number_of_strings}, kwp_dc_for_each_solar_module = #{kwp_dc_for_each_solar_module}, data_interval_factor = #{data_interval_factor}, other_losses = #{other_losses}, annual_pv_module_degradation = #{annual_pv_module_degradation}, transformer_losses = #{transformer_losses}, soiling = #{soiling}, commissioning = #{commissioning}, cable_losses = #{cable_losses} WHERE `id` = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS value, d.id_device_type, d.devicename AS label FROM device d WHERE d.id_site = #{id_site} AND d.id_device_type IN (4, 6) AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0

SELECT count(*) as totalRecord FROM site s LEFT JOIN site_employee_map sem ON sem.id_site = s.id WHERE s.is_delete = 0 AND s.status = 1 AND sem.id_employee = #{id_employee}
AND s.name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{keyword}, "%")
